activeTasks.title: Fix BacktestEngine ↔ Strategy interface mismatch
activeTasks.description: Tier 0 strategies generate 0 trades. BacktestEngine feeds raw ticks but strategies expect OHLCV candles. 32 strategies can't load (syntax errors). THIS IS THE BOTTLENECK.

activeTasks.title: Find lightweight way to check Claude Max 5h window token usage
activeTasks.description: Rob wants a way to check % of 5-hour token window used. Need to find if Anthropic exposes this via API headers or dashboard.
